reviewText: First it says its compatible with our tv system but, not to our region. Once I decoded the show is nothing new for the Blue Men. There is no actual integration of the Blues with the Kabuki. Very boring.

Fast shipping and very good quality of the DVD!
This blueman group show is very unique that you cannot see in U.S. or other places.
We have been looking forward this for a long time.
Thanks for the good work.
